name: Arduino timelapse
body:
### Description

Timelapse timer can make foto with different intevals. It's based on ATmega8L 8MHz with special bootloader Arduino NG. 
This device has has 3 indicators that show interval length  (1 sec - 1 hour).


### Schematic
Board has small size and consists smd components. Supply is provided by 9V battery.

### Authors
2013, Evgeniy J (@jemsgit), Alexey Cherepanov (@ftp27)

### Contact
jemguns@gmail.com
